headline: Southern’s (SO) $76B Capital Plan and Solar Expansion Could Be a Game Changer
summary: Earlier in September 2025, Southern Company announced an increase in its five-year base capital plan from US$63 billion to US$76 billion, alongside approval for five utility-scale solar projects in Georgia adding 1,068 MW of capacity. This expansion is aimed at addressing accelerating load growth from data centers and advanced manufacturing while reinforcing Southern’s influence on national nuclear energy policy. We'll explore how this aggressive capital plan and large-scale solar investment...
